name: @sqlpm-util/sqlpm-workspace
description: **sqlpm-workspace**: The pnpm workspace that contains all of our packages, projects, and utilities.

scripts.git:haschanges: sh -c 'if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain)" ]; then echo "You have uncommitted changes. Please commit or stash them before releasing."; exit 1; fi'
scripts.release: pnpm run git:haschanges && pnpm -r run release && commit-and-tag-version
scripts.release:dryrun: pnpm run git:haschanges && pnpm -r run release:dryrun && commit-and-tag-version --dry-run
scripts.deploy:all: pnpm run git:haschanges && pnpm build && pnpm release && pnpm publish:all
scripts.build:watch: pnpm exec nx watch --all -- nx run \$NX_PROJECT_NAME:build
scripts.develop:watch: pnpm exec nx watch --all -- nx run \$NX_PROJECT_NAME:develop
